mapper.insert: insert into community( comid, zoneid, comname, address, isenable, memo, createBy, createTime, modifyBy, modifyTime ) values( #{comid}, #{zoneid}, #{comname}, #{address}, #{isenable}, #{memo}, #{createBy}, #{createTime}, #{modifyBy}, #{modifyTime} )
mapper.update: update community set zoneid = #{zoneid}, comname = #{comname}, address = #{address}, isenable = #{isenable}, memo = #{memo}, modifyBy = #{modifyBy}, modifyTime = #{modifyTime} where comid = #{comid}
